mod.name: The Servant 0.9.3
mod.description: Adds The Servant as a new playable character. She has a full set of 75 cards, 8 new mechanics and 11 exclusive relics.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 Block.

cards.name: Defend+
cards.description: Gain 8 Block.

cards.name: Exchange
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards.
Obtain 2 Knives.

cards.name: Exchange+
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards.
Obtain 2 Knives.
Retain.

cards.name: Kidney Shot
cards.description:
Throw 2 Knives.
Each deals 4 damage and apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Kidney Shot+
cards.description:
Throw 3 Knives.
Each deals 4 damage and apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 damage.

cards.name: Strike+
cards.description: Deal 9 damage.

cards.name: Alleviate
cards.description:
Discard up to 3 cards.
Gain 5 Block for each card you discard.

cards.name: Alleviate+
cards.description:
Discard up to 3 cards.
Gain 7 Block for each card you discard.

cards.name: Bottled Time
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bottled Time+
cards.description:
Innate.
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Defy
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail for 1 turn.

cards.name: Defy+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail for 1 turn.
Retain.

cards.name: Double Edge
cards.description:
Deal 15 damage.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Backlash.

cards.name: Double Edge+
cards.description:
Deal 21 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Backlash.

cards.name: Fast Forward
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
If there is no Attack in your hand, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Fast Forward+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
If there is no Attack in your hand, draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Potential
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Shift: Deals 5 additional damage this combat and put this in your hand.

cards.name: Potential+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Shift: Deals 7 additional damage this combat and put this in your hand.

cards.name: Rearm
cards.description:
Draw 2 cards.
Obtain 5 Knives.

cards.name: Rearm+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Obtain 5 Knives.

cards.name: Replace
cards.description:
Discard a card from your draw pile.
Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Replace+
cards.description:
Discard a card from your draw pile.
Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

cards.name: Revamp
cards.description:
Return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand and
upgrade it.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Revamp+
cards.description:
Return 1 card from your discard pile to your hand and
upgrade it.

cards.name: Rewind
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Put the card at the bottom of your discard pile in your hand.

cards.name: Rewind+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Put the card at the bottom of your discard pile in your hand.

cards.name: Ricochet
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 9 damage and bounces between enemies 2 times.

cards.name: Ricochet+
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 9 damage and bounces between enemies 3 times.

cards.name: Shattered Reality
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Shift: Deal DOUBLE damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Shattered Reality+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
Shift: Deal DOUBLE damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Spin
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage and apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies.
Backlash.

cards.name: Spin+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage and apply 2 Weak to ALL enemies.
Backlash.

cards.name: Starlight
cards.description:
Throw 2 Knives.
Each deals 5 damage to a random enemy and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Starlight+
cards.description:
Throw 3 Knives.
Each deals 5 damage to a random enemy and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Time Warp
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Discard 1 card(s).
Shift: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Time Warp+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Discard 2 card(s).
Shift: Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Unruled
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
For each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you, deal 2 additional damage.

cards.name: Unruled+
cards.description:
Deal 11 damage.
For each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you, deal 3 additional damage.

cards.name: Advance
cards.description: Put 2 Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Advance+
cards.description:
Innate.
Put 2 Cost 0 cards from your draw pile into your hand.

cards.name: Barrier
cards.description:
Gain 7 Block.
Gain 7 Protection.

cards.name: Barrier+
cards.description:
Gain 10 Block.
Gain 10 Protection.

cards.name: Best Practice
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may upgrade 1 card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Best Practice+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may upgrade 1 card in your hand for the rest of combat.

cards.name: Collapse
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your current Protection to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Collapse+
cards.description: Deal damage equal to your current Protection to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Comet
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Draw 2 cards.
Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.

cards.name: Comet+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Draw 3 cards.
Draw 1 less card for each card you have played this turn.

cards.name: Contraction
cards.description:
Gain 5 Protection.
Convert all Block to Protection.

cards.name: Contraction+
cards.description:
Gain 8 Protection.
Convert all Block to Protection.

cards.name: Dancing Silver
cards.description:
Convert 4 Knives to Satellites.
Gain 2 Block for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Dancing Silver+
cards.description:
Convert 6 Knives to Satellites.
Gain 2 Block for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Deadline
cards.description:
Vision: Apply 2 Blight and Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Deadline+
cards.description:
Vision: Apply 3 Blight and Vulnerable.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Desolation
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage.
Double the enemy's Blight.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Desolation+
cards.description:
Deal 16 damage.
Double the enemy's Blight.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dual Dimension
cards.description:
Double your Protection.
Exhaust.
Shift: Gain 6 Protection.

cards.name: Dual Dimension+
cards.description:
Double your Protection.
Exhaust.
Shift: Gain 6 Protection.

cards.name: Fan of Knives
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife at each enemy X times.
Each deals 7 damage.

cards.name: Fan of Knives+
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife at each enemy X times.
Each deals 10 damage.

cards.name: Foresight
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, look at the
top 2 cards of
your draw pile.
You may discard
any of them.

cards.name: Foresight+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, look at the
top 3 cards of
your draw pile.
You may discard
any of them.

cards.name: Gear Up
cards.description:
Gain 6 Protection.
Obtain 3 Knives.

cards.name: Gear Up+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Protection.
Obtain 3 Knives.

cards.name: Gouge
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage and apply 1 Blight X times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gouge+
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage and apply 1 Blight X+1 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hightail
cards.description:
Gain 8 Protection
X time(s).
Backlash.

cards.name: Hightail+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Protection
X time(s).
Backlash.

cards.name: Instant Armor
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 6 Protection.
Convert 3 Knives to Satellites.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Instant Armor+
cards.description:
Innate.
Gain 9 Protection.
Convert 3 Knives to Satellites.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Luminosity
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 1 Elegance.

cards.name: Luminosity+
cards.description:
Gain 1 Strength.
Gain 2 Elegance.

cards.name: Manipulate
cards.description: Adds X+1 random Temporal cards to your draw pile.

cards.name: Manipulate+
cards.description: Adds X+2 random Temporal cards to your draw pile.

cards.name: Misdirect
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply 1 Blight and Weak.

cards.name: Misdirect+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Apply 1 Blight and Weak.

cards.name: Moon Phase
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you.

cards.name: Moon Phase+
cards.description: At the end of your turn, gain 2 Block for each stack of Weak, Vulnerable and Frail on you.

cards.name: Moondial
cards.description: Add 2 random Temporal cards to your hand and your draw pile.

cards.name: Moondial+
cards.description: Add 3 random Temporal cards to your hand and your draw pile.

cards.name: Moonlight
cards.description:
Throw 2 Knives.
Each deals 5 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Moonlight+
cards.description:
Throw 3 Knives.
Each deals 5 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Orbit
cards.description:
Convert 3 Knives to Satellites.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Orbit+
cards.description:
Convert 4 Knives to Satellites.
Deal 3 damage to ALL enemies for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Read
cards.description: Vision: Gain 15 Protection and apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Read+
cards.description: Vision: Gain 20 Protection and apply 3 Weak.

cards.name: Reality Marble
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, Retain up to 1 card.
The cards you retain lose Ethereal for this combat.

cards.name: Reality Marble+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the end of your turn, Retain up to 2 card.
The cards you retain lose Ethereal for this combat.

cards.name: Reset
cards.description:
Clear ALL Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
Each stack gives you 1 Protection.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reset+
cards.description:
Clear ALL Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
Each stack gives you 2 Protection.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Returning Blade
cards.description:
Vision: Deal 6 damage to ALL enemies, put this card in your hand.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Returning Blade+1
cards.description:
Vision: Deal 8 damage to ALL enemies, put this card in your hand.
Can be upgraded any number of times.

cards.name: Sabotage
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Enemy loses Strength equals to the damage for 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sabotage+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Enemy loses Strength equals to the damage for 1 turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shifting Gears
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
Shift: Gain 1 Elegance.

cards.name: Shifting Gears+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Shift: Gain 1 Elegance.

cards.name: Shuttle
cards.description:
Activate card and relic effects that will activate at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shuttle+
cards.description:
Activate card and relic effects that will activate at the start of your next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Silver Blades
cards.description:
Knives deal 2 additional damage.
At the start
of your turn,
obtain 2 Knives.

cards.name: Silver Blades+
cards.description:
Knives deal 3 additional damage.
At the start
of your turn,
obtain 3 Knives.

cards.description:
Vision: Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 15 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Snipe+
cards.description:
Vision: Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 20 damage and apply 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Special Formula
cards.description:
Gain [B] .
Heal 5 HP.
Backlash.
Exhaust.

cards.description:
Gain [B] .
Heal 8 HP.
Backlash.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Star Chef
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] .
Ethereal.

cards.name: Star Chef+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, you may exhaust 1 card and gain [B] .

cards.name: Surpressing Fire
cards.description: Whenever you throw or convert a Knife, gain 2 Block.

cards.name: Surpressing Fire+
cards.description: Whenever you throw or convert a Knife, gain 3 Block.

cards.name: Time Theft
cards.description:
Vision: Gain [B] [B] .
Draw 2 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Time Theft+
cards.description:
Vision: Gain [B] [B] [B] .
Draw 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Waste Not
cards.description:
At the end of your turn, spend all [B] .
Draw 1 more card next turn for each [B] you spend.

cards.name: Waste Not+
cards.description:
At the end of your turn, spend all [B] .
Draw 1 more card next turn for each [B] you spend.

cards.description:
Look at your
draw pile.
You may discard
up to 3 cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Deny+
cards.description:
Look at your
draw pile.
You may discard
up to 3 cards.

cards.name: Dilation
cards.description:
Gain 3 Protection.
This card's Protection is increased by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Dilation+
cards.description:
Gain 4 Protection.
This card's Protection is increased by 1 this combat.

cards.name: Duplication
cards.description:
Duplicate 1 card(s).
The duplicates
cost 0 this turn.
Backlash.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Duplication+
cards.description:
Duplicate 2 card(s).
The duplicates
cost 0 this turn.
Backlash.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Enbodiment
cards.description: At the end your turn, add a random Temporal card to your draw pile.

cards.name: Enbodiment+
cards.description: At the end your turn, add a random Upgraded Temporal card to your draw pile.

cards.name: Flawless Form
cards.description:
Gain 12 Protection.
You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.

cards.name: Flawless Form+
cards.description:
Gain 16 Protection.
You are not affected by Weak, Vulnerable and Frail.
Retain.

cards.name: Flowering Night
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
You may only draw 6 cards each turn by this power.

cards.name: Flowering Night+
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card, draw a card.
You may only draw 6 cards each turn by this power.

cards.name: Forge in Time
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Gain 5 Protection and 2 Knives for each exhausted card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Forge in Time+
cards.description:
Exhaust your hand.
Gain 7 Protection and 2 Knives for each exhausted card.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Initiator
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
Add Follow Up
to your hand.

cards.name: Initiator+
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Add Follow Up+
to your hand.

cards.name: Killing Doll
cards.description:
Throw ALL Knives.
Each deals 2 damage to a random enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Killing Doll+
cards.description:
Throw ALL Knives.
Each deals 3 damage to a random enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Light Flow
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage
3 times.
Backlash.

cards.name: Light Flow+
cards.description:
Deal 12 damage
3 times.
Backlash.

cards.name: Murderous Aura
cards.description: At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Murderous Aura+
cards.description:
Innate.
At the start of your turn, apply 1 Blight to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Pendulum of Eternity
cards.description:
Deal 33 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Weak.
Shift: Costs 1 less [B] .

cards.name: Pendulum of Eternity+
cards.description:
Deal 33 damage.
Apply 3 Vulnerable.
Apply 3 Weak.
Shift: Costs 1 less [B] .

cards.name: Silver Matrix
cards.description:
Convert 2 Knives to Satellites.
Gain 1 Matrix for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Silver Matrix+
cards.description:
Convert 3 Knives to Satellites.
Gain 1 Matrix for each Satellite you have.

cards.name: Solidify
cards.description:
Choose 1 Temporal card and place it on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Solidify+
cards.description:
Choose 1 Temporal card twice and place it on top of your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Sculpture
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage
six times.
Enemy loses
3 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Soul Sculpture+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage
six times.
Enemy loses
4 Strength.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sunlight
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 16 damage
and apply 1 Blight
to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Sunlight+
cards.description:
Throw 1 Knife.
Each deals 21 damage
and apply 2 Blight
to ALL enemies.

cards.name: The World
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
The next card you play this turn costs 0. Exhaust.

cards.name: The World+
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
The next card you play this turn costs 0. Exhaust.

cards.name: True Sight
cards.description: Vision effects will always be triggered.

cards.name: True Sight+
cards.description:
Vision effects will always be triggered.
Retain.

relics.name: Uniform
relics.description: At the start of each combat, obtain 6 Knives.
relics.flavorText: It helps in keeping dirty stuff away as well as in carrying weapons.

relics.name: Broom
relics.description: Every 10 cards you manually discard, gain [B] .

relics.name: Knee Brace
relics.description: Gain 3 Block for each Shift effect you trigger.

relics.name: Paper Swan
relics.description: Whenever you apply Blight, you have 50% chance to apply an additional 1 Blight.

relics.name: Old Scarf
relics.description: At the start of each combat, upgrade all Vision cards in your deck for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: It is said that this is a family heirloom.

relics.name: Pocket Watch
relics.description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, draw a card.

relics.name: Roman Bracelet
relics.description: At the start of each combat, put 2 Temporal Essence in your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Only few people may release its true potential.

relics.name: Mystery Sword
relics.description: Gain [B] at the start of each turn. The first Skill you play each turn has Backlash.
relics.flavorText: Found in the depth. Users must sacrifice themselves to wield this sword.

relics.name: Splendid Attire
relics.description: Replaces Uniform. At the start of each combat, obtain 12 Knives, gain 1 Elegance and 3 Satellites.

relics.name: Stone Mask
relics.description: Each time you kill a non-minion enemy, heal for 2 HP and gain 1 permanent Max HP.
relics.flavorText: You feel a sudden impulse to reject your humanity.

relics.name: Pan
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 2 Blight to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Backlash
keywords.description: Apply 1 Weak, Vulnerable AND Frail to you.

keywords.name: Blight
keywords.description: Blighted enemies will take extra damage when attacked.

keywords.name: Elegance
keywords.description: Elegance improves Block and Protection gained from cards.

keywords.name: Knives
keywords.description: Knives are the Servant's most dedicated weapons. Can be thrown or converted.

keywords.name: Matrix
keywords.description: Reduce Attack damage taken by 50%. Lose 1 Martix whenever you are attacked.

keywords.name: Protection
keywords.description: Whenever you lose HP, lose Protection instead. Protection will not be removed at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Satellite
keywords.description: Whenever you use an Attack, lose 1 Satellite and attack an extra time for 4 damage. Whenever you are attacked, lose 1 Satellite and deal 4 damage to the attacker. Satellites count as Knives.

keywords.name: Shift
keywords.description: Shift effects can only be triggered by manually discarding the card.

keywords.name: Temporal
keywords.description: Temporal cards cost 0 and have Ethereal and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Vision
keywords.description: Predict the enemy intent for the next turn. If correct, trigger the effect(s) at the start of your next turn.
